overview:
Steve is a technologist with 15 years programming experience, 8 of which spent architecting, implementing, and deploying mission critical applications in financial services and retail.

Steve joined Shutl from Provenir, where he served as Senior Platform Architect. At Provenir Steveâ€™s responsibilities included leading architecture, development, and project management on large software projects for FleetBankBoston, Wells Fargo, TDBanknorth, Key Bank, RBS Citizens, and Nordea.

Prior to Provenir, Steve served as lead developer at The Home Depot where he was responsible for managing the Data Services team for homedepot.com.

Steveâ€™s passion as a technologist lies in leveraging IT assets to make the business more efficient, simple, and responsive to customer needs. He has a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Economics with Computer Science minor from Dartmouth College, a Masters of Software Engineering from the University of Texas at Austin, and a Masters of Business Administration from the McCombs School of Business.
